title: All 32 - Kansas City Chiefs: Patrick Mahomes-Andy Reid dynasty might be just beginning with Matt Derrick (Football 6/25)
description:
We've reached the point in 'All 32' where we get to talk about the world champion Kansas City Chiefs. To do that, Matt Derrick of Chiefs Digest joins Will Brinson to discuss the team's somewhat surprising first-round selection of Clyde Edwards-Helaire (2:15) and other help for Patrick Mahomes (not that he necessarily needs it). Matt breaks down how the Super Bowl MVP has perfected Andy Reid's offense and what more to expect from KC's star QB in 2020 (8:00). More analysis follows on wideouts Tyreek Hill and Mecole Hardman (9:30), if the defense can replicate their last-season success (13:45), the contracts of Chris Jones (16:15) and Mahomes (18:30) AND how many Super Bowls the organization can win in the next 5 years.
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @mattderrick
Subscribe to our Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw

itunes:subtitle: The Chiefs are the champs and they might be even better than last year. Matt Derrick of Chiefs Digest joins the pod to break down their chances of repeating.
